abstract.text: Enable responsive capture if the device supports.
Adds a backdrop blur effect to any SwiftUI View natively.
Prefer capture content in constant color if the device is capable.
Sets the style for buttons within this view to a button style with a responsive button style.
Enable multitasking camera access if the device supports.
A button that supports Sendable, async action.
Less code, better experience for both developers and users.
Enable zero shutter lag if the device supports.
Sets the device types for the camera session to find the appropriate capture device.
Rotates a view in reverse based on device orientation changes.
Enable auto deferred photo delivery if the device supports.
Associates a binding to a counter rotation angle that matches the given orientation with the view.
Adds an action to perform when this view recognizes a long press gesture.
Set quality prioritization for output photos.
